DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety , tolerability , maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) TTI-237 treatment subject advance malignant solid tumor .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating TTI-237 Advanced Malignant Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: Documented diagnosis malignant solid tumor measurable disease Life expectancy least 12 week ECOG performance status 0 , 1 , 2 Recent major surgery , radiation therapy anticancer treatment History prior malignancy within last 5 year
